attributes.action: Legalise medical use of Psilocybin in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
There has been studies that have shown Psilocybin as an effective treatment for physical issues and Mental health issues - Depression, PTSD, addiction, anorexia. Why deprive people a drug that could change their life without the side effects of traditional medicines.

When used in medical and scientific settings psilocybin, much like ketamine, could be a cost effective, high yield, life changing medication. It would create Jobs, opportunities and money for the NHS
attributes.background: Legalise the Medicinal use of Psilocybin.
